Text:
Logged in Just to comment - 

I have this game already but wanted to let you know what the fuck else I want:

1:) The humans of the world to get over themselves and commit hari kari - That is except for my loved ones, few good friends and the poster of this torrent.

2.) Can we PLEASE stop the Kardashians from having an empire ala Hitler?

3.) Theresa, stop being a cunt and let me see my 2 little girls .. if not, your the first to go in the hari kari line.

4.) Obama? Again? Oh HELL no!

5.) Last but not least - The right to append this list as I see fit .. 

Poster - Did you get all that? Oh and can u grab me a coffee? Cream no sugar please!

-- Thanks for the sarcasm that made a broken man smile .. may u die quickly and painlessly when the great FCC in the sky sensors ur life for trying to make people lol in a world that forgot how to laugh at itself without starting a movement.
